name: Midnight Mayhem - Black Friday Polish
description:
This thermal polish was created in celebration of Black Friday, Small Business Saturday, and Cyber Monday. It's just a crazy weekend for shopping! Midnight Mayhem contains navy blue, neon pink, neon blue, black, and silver holo glitters. You'll find shapes like skulls, hearts and stars inside, too! When warm, this polish is a light purple, nearly clear color. When cold, it transitions to a grey. It contains hints of shimmer and glows purple in the dark!

Due to some of the irregular shaped glitter, some fishing may be required for this polish. For this reason, Midnight Mayhem will only be available in full size bottles.

name: Always A Lady - pink glow in the dark thermal
description: Always a Lady is a shimmery light pink when warm that transitions to a darker pink/fuchsia when cold. It contains subtle blue shimmer and a bit of soft white and iridescent glitters. It also glows in the dark!

name: Christmas 2013 Collection - Full Size Set
description:
This listing is for the entire Christmas collection, which includes 2 thermals, 1 crelly/milky polish, and 2 sparkly glitter toppers!

This collection will only be offered as a full size set.

name: It's Elf'n Cold Outside! - Christmas 2013
description:
As one fan said, this polish is like capturing winter in a bottle. This clear glitter topper contains some white and light pink snowflakes and subtle, soft white and iridescent glitters. What really gives this polish a gorgeous POP is the hints of green and blue shimmer. 

The picture shows two coats of It's Elf'n Cold Outside! Over Sally Hansen's Wet Cement. Gotta love the versatility of a glitter topper!

Due to the irregular shaped glitters in this polish, some fishing may be required to distribute the glitters evenly. For this reason, this polish will only be available in full size bottles.

name: Elf Yourself - Christmas 2013
description:
Elf Yourself is like Christmas in a bottle! It is a clear glitter topper with a blend of red, green, gold and silver metallic and holo glitters. It also contains holo candy canes, metallic green Christmas trees, and silver holo bells. Elf yourself also has hints of silver and holo shimmer. Christmas in a bottle, I tell you!

Due to the irregular glitter shapes, some fishing may be required to provide a variety of glitters on your nails. For this reason, Elf Yourself will only be available in full size bottles.

name: Sweet Treats - Christmas 2013
description: Sweet Treats is a slightly shimmery nude milky polish. Inspired by gingerbread houses, this polish contains a mix of brown, copper, red, green and dark pink glitters. I even threw in some dark pink hearts. You also have the option to add a gingerbread scent to it!

name: Christmas Cheer - Christmas 2013
description: Christmas Cheer is a thermal glitter polish that goes from white when warm to green when cold. It contains a blend of red, green, and black glitters.

name: Candy Cane Binge - Christmas 2013 Collection
description: Candy Cane Binge is a cute thermal polish that pays tribute to a Christmas staple- candy canes! When warm, this polish is a shimmery soft white. It transitions to red when your hands get cold. Peppermint Binge contains a blend of red, white and silver holo glitters. The coolest part? You have the option to get it with an added peppermint scent so your fingers will smell festive!

name: Watermelon Bits - Thermal Glitter Nail Polish
description:
This thermal nail polish is white when warm, minty green when cold. It is packed with a fun glitter mix that was inspired by watermelon! You'll find neon green, bright pink and black glitters in a variety of shapes and sizes. Shown is two coats with topcoat. Photo credit to @bdettenails on Instagram.

Be sure to top this with a good topcoat to achieve a smooth feel!

name: Formula 86 - Glow in the Dark Glitter Nail Polish
description:
Formula 86 offers a fun mix of pink skull glitter, black, neon green, and blue glitters. Charge it up in the sun and watch it glow bright green in the shade! The glow color will be bright for a few minutes and then continue to fade until it is recharged.

A throwback to my very first collection (can you guess which Roald Dahl book inspired this polish??) This is the perfect nail polish to add a little glow to your look this Halloween. Pick it up while you can, this polish is limited edition! And watch out- Formula 86 is known for turning children into mice!

Wear it alone or on top of another color, but remember to use a quality top coat to smooth out all the glitter. The topper has no effect on the glow properties. I loaded this polish with pink skulls, though it does require some fishing. For this reason, this polish will only be available in full size bottles (not pictured). The larger bottle size allows for easier grabbing! 

Photo Credit to @lacquerloon on Instagram.

name: Get Nasty - Silver to Black Holographic Thermal Nail Polish
description: This is Get Nasty, a polish inspired by  the San Antonio Spurs! This polish is a silver/charcoal grey when warm, and transforms to a gunmetal/black polish when your hands get cold. It has a chrome-like finish. As an extra plus- Get Nasty includes spectraflair, so it is also holo! Support your favorite basketball team by rocking this color ;)

name: Beach Party - White to Blue/Violet Thermal Nail Polish
description:
This thermal nail polish is white/light blue when warm, violet/blue when cold. It is packed with a fun neon glitter mix! Shown is two coats with topcoat. 

Be sure to top this with a good topcoat to achieve a smooth feel!

Photo credit goes to @lusterlacquer on IG. Visit her blog at www.lusterlacquer.blogspot.com for full review!

name: The Handsome Stranger - Thermal Nail Polish
description:
A conceited, spoiled girl attends a party at a bar one night, and is pleased when a handsome man asks her to dance. She gladly accepts, and witnesses grow more and more fearful when they notice his strange feet.... The Handsome Stranger spins the girl around and around, faster and faster, and when she finally drops to the floor, the man is gone. Witnesses approach her, only to discover the girl is dead.


This beautiful thermal polish goes from a shimmery gold when warm to burnt orange when cold! It reminded in a way of the colors of fire, which to me represent The Handsome Stranger's devilish nature!

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must! 


Photo Credit to @lacquerloon on Instagram.

name: Girly Girl - Holographic Thermal Nail Polish
description:
This thermal nail polish is pink when warm, purple when cold. It also includes spectraflair for a holo effect!

Be sure to top this with a good topcoat to achieve a smooth feel and a really shiny look!

name: Miss Honey - Nude Holographic Nail Polish
description: Inspired by Matilda's savior in Roald Dahl's famous book, Miss Honey will give you a classy and sophisticated look. Take it outside, and you'll see this color carries a little fire! Spectraflair creates this gorgeous rainbow effect under the sun. Pictured is 2 coats of Miss Honey alone.

name: Witching Hour - Glow in the Dark Glitter Polish
description:
Witching Hour is a medium blue jelly with purple, turquoise, pink, and some neon green glitters and stars. It also has a beautiful blue shimmer that really comes out in the sun! Charge it up in sunlight and watch it glow bright blue in the shade! The glow will last several minutes and continue to fade until you charge it again.

While this polish will add an awesome glow to your festive Halloween attire, I can easily see this polish being worn year-round.

Photo credit to @lacquerloon and @bdettenails on Instagram.

name: Susto - Grey glitter crelly
description:
Susto is a light grey crelly with lime green, orange, purple, red orange, and black glitters. It also has some black stars scattered in. This lovely shade also has a very subtle silver/purple shimmer.

Susto is the Spanish word for "fright," and is often associated with the shock a person experiences after coming in contact with the supernatural. Don't worry though....while this polish is definitely very festive, there's certainly nothing scary about it!

Pictured is 3 thin coats with one coat seche vite top coat.

Photo credit to @lacquerloon on Instagram

name: Love's Course - White to purple glitter thermal
description:
This nail polish is named for a quote in "A Midsummer Night's Dream," that says, "The course of true love never did run smooth." 


When your hands are at normal temperature,the base will appear white or a very slight purple. When your hands get cold, the true color (a medium lavender/purple) of the pigment is revealed.

name: Budding Love - White to pink glitter thermal nail polish
description:
This nail polish is named for a quote by Shakespeare's Juliet: 

"This bud of love, by summer's ripening breath,
 May prove a beauteous flower when next we meet."

The pink, purple, and scattered green glitters bring to mind the colors of the love and blossoming flowers. 

When your hands are at normal temperature,the base will appear white or a very slight pink. When your hands get cold, the true color (a rosy pink) of the pigment is revealed.

name: Pretty Follies - White to teal glitter thermal
description:
The name for this lovely polish comes from The Merchant of Venice, in which Shakespeare claims, "But love is blind, and lovers cannot see what petty follies they themselves commit." I think everyone can relate to having done something really dumb for the sake of love!

Pretty Follies is a teal thermal glitter polish. When warm, it takes on a white/light blue color, and when cold, it is teal. It includes teal and pink dot glitters, as well as some gold and holo glitters, too. It's a very playful, fun color! Shown is two thick-ish coats on my nails. Remember to add a good topper to smooth out all those glitters, and let the polish dry completely between coats to keep the glitter in place!

name: Lover's Tears - White to Blue Glitter Thermal
description:
This nail polish is named for a quote by Shakespeare's Romeo: 

“Love is a smoke raised with the fume of sighs;
Being purged, a fire sparkling in lovers' eyes;
Being vexed, a sea nourished with loving tears...

The green, gold, and bright blue glitters bring to mind the colors of the sea. 

When your hands are at normal temperature,the base will appear a very light (nearly white) blue. When your hands get cold, the true color (a teal-ish blue) of the pigment is revealed. 

I'm sure many people have experienced the downside to love....at least this time, we can make it look beautiful ;)

name: FULL SIZE - Complete Game of Thrones Collection
description:
This is the discounted Game of Thrones Collection set. 

This set includes full size bottles of:

The North Remembers
Daggers in the Dark
Not Today
Dark and Full of Terrors
Dragons Trump Everything
Summerhall's Shadow
Hands of Gold are Always Cold
Winds of Winter
Children of the Forest
Eyes of Wight


These polishes dry to a matte finish. It is highly recommended that you use a quality topcoat to smooth out glitters/shimmer and get a shiny look!

name: MINI - Complete Game of Thrones Thermal Collection
description:
This is the discounted Game of Thrones Collection set. 

This set includes mini size bottles of:

The North Remembers
Daggers in the Dark
Not Today
Dark and Full of Terrors
Summerhall's Shadow
Hands of Gold are Always Cold
Winds of Winter
Children of the Forest
Eyes of Wight

As well as one full-size bottle of Dragons Trump Everything, which is not available in mini sizes.


These polishes do dry to a matte finish. It is highly recommended that you use a quality topcoat to smooth out glitters/shimmer and get a shiny look!

name: Eyes of Wight - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
Eyes of Wight is inspired by the terrifying creatures of the cold in the Game of Thrones Series - the Others. The bright blue eyes are a very noticeable feature on these monsters.

This polish is a light blue when warm that darkens as it gets cold. It is a subtle transition, but still noticeable in person. In the dark, this polish will glow blue!

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must. Eyes of Wight in particular is slightly textured/gritty, so you may need more than 1 coat of topcoat. The glow-in-the-dark effect is activated by charging the polish in the sun. It will last for a few minutes before you charge it up again.

name: Daggers in the Dark - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
This beautiful thermal polish goes from a charcoal grey when warm to a plum color when cold. It has an almost metallic/chrome silver finish to it- a perfect color for fall/winter! Daggers in the Dark was inspired by a premonition Melisendre has about Jon Snow toward the end of book 5 of the Game of Thrones Series. 

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must!

name: Hands of Gold are Always Cold - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
Hands of Gold are Always Cold is inspired by Tyrion Lannister, who serves as hand to the king for a short time in the Game of Thrones Series. Those gold hands become a pretty important piece once he is out of that position!

When warm, this polish is an orangey-gold color. When cold, it transitions to a darker bronze. There are subtle hints of gold and green shimmer in this polish.

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must!

name: Children of the Forest - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
This nail polish is named for some mysterious characters in the Game of Thrones series, the children of the forest. In the books, it is known that they were among the first inhabitants of Westeros. The Children had a vast knowledge and power over all things in nature. Inspired by this, I chose to use earthy tones in this polish. A light neutral color when warm, this polish transitions to a dark taupe/brown when it gets cold. It has some gold, brown and green glitters in it as well.

This polish dries to a matte finish, and because of the glitter, it may not appear smooth on its own. I would recommend using a thicker topcoat, like Seche Vite, to smooth it out and give it a high shine!

name: Summerhall's Shadow - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
This thermal polish goes from a light bluish/grey when warm to a purple/lavender color when cold. It has hints of siver and purple shimmers in it. Summerhall's Shadow was inspired by Prince Rhaegar in the Game of Thrones series. He was born shortly after a devastating fire in the castle at Summerhall, which took the lives of several of his family members. People noticed that Rhaegar seemed to be affected by this "shadow" on his birth, and the prince often passed his time at the castle ruins. I chose these colors because, like most Targaryens, Rhaegar had silver hair and violet eyes.

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must!

name: Winds of Winter - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
This nail polish is named for the next book in the Game of Thrones series, to be titled "Winds of Winter."

When your hands are at normal temperature,the base will appear a light grey/blue. When your hands get cold, the polish becomes a darker shade of blue.

This polish dries to a matte texture, and because of the glitter, it may not appear smooth on its own. I would recommend using a thicker topcoat, like Seche Vite, to smooth it out and give it a high shine!

name: Dragons Trump Everything - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
Dragons Trump Everything was inspired by Daenarys Targaryen, primarily because of her silver hair and violet eyes. When warm, the base of this polish is clear with hints of blue and purple shimmer. When it gets cold, it turns purple in color. This polish may be worn alone or over another color, depending on preference. 

This polish contains larger dot glitters and star glitters, which may require some fishing to pull out of the bottle. For this reason, Dragons Trump Everything will only be available in full size bottles. I feel that pulling out the bigger shapes is easier with these bottles due to the wider neck; the minis are a bit small to make this easy.

This polish dries to a matte finish, and because of the glitter, it may not appear smooth on its own. I would recommend using a thicker topcoat, like Seche Vite, to smooth it out and give it a high shine!

name: Not Today - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
Not Today was inspired by a quote said by Syrio Forel: "There is only one god, and his name is death. What do we say to death? 'Not today'." 

This polish is a dark grey when your hands are warm and transitions to a full black when your hands get cold. It is a subtle change, but noticeable nonetheless. 

Not Today is also made with tiny brown glitters as well as some dark grey and black glitters.These colors just remind me of men and steel and death, so I thought it made a good combination!

This polish dries to a matte finish, and because of the glitter, it may not appear smooth on its own. I would recommend using a thicker topcoat, like Seche Vite, to smooth it out and give it a high shine!

name: Dark and Full of Terrors - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
Dark and Full of Terrors is another Game of Thrones inspired nail polish. This particular shade was inspired by Melisandre and the followers of the red god. When warm, this color is a brighter red shade, and as your hands get cold, it transitions to deep plum/blackened color. It contains some small black glitter and varying sizes of red glitters. Overall, it has a very vampy look!

This polish dries to a matte finish, and because of the glitter, it may not appear smooth on its own. I would recommend using a thicker topcoat, like Seche Vite, to smooth it out and give it a high shine!

name: The North Remembers - Game of Thrones Collection
description:
The North Remembers is a shimmery white when warm and shifts to a bright red when cold. It is inspired by the old gods in the Game of Thrones series and the heart trees northerners pray beneath. In the books, it is widely believed that the heart trees, which have white trunks and red leaves, keep the old gods connected to the men on earth. 

This polish is very sheer, so it may require a few coats to reach full opacity. In the picture, I am wearing 3 coats, 2 thin, 1 thick, with a coat of Seche Vite on top. A person who does not like to have visible nail lines might want to layer this over a light color for more coverage.

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must!

name: Nude Beach
description:
This beautiful thermal polish goes from a peachy nude when warm to coral when cold! It's the perfect summery color! 

Shimmer particles in this polish can be a bit clumpy, so a good topcoat to smooth it out and make it shine is a must!
